.. _`cairosvg`:

CAIROSVG
========

Convert SVG files with cairosvg.





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule:
        input:
            "{prefix}.svg"
        output:
            "{prefix}.{fmt,(pdf|png)}"
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-212-g458009d7/utils/cairosvg"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.




Authors
-------


* Johannes KÃ¶ster
